documentation.text:
@notice Returns collateral to long and short parties.
 @param forwardContract Address of the forward contract.

@notice Returns collateral to long and short parties.
 @param forwardContract Address of the forward contract.

params.amount: Amount of collateral to be transfered from personal wallet.
params.fromShort: Bool whether collateral is from short or long party of forward contract.

params.contractValueChange: Change of value of forward contract during m-t--m

returns.owedAmount_: Amount owed by losing party after mToM

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.collateralAmount: Amount of collateral to be transfered

params.shortToLong: Bool indicating the direction of transfer.

returns.amountOwed_: Amount of collateral owed if balance insufficient.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addCollateral(address,bool,uint256).notice: Transfers collateral from personal wallet to collateral wallet.

collateralMToM(address,int256).notice: Adjusts balances of both parties according to m-to-m.

returnCollateral(address).notice: Returns collateral to long and short parties.

setupInitialCollateral(address,address,a.notice: Transfers initial collateral requirements from personal wallets to this wallet.

userdoc.notice: Wallet for holding ERC20 tokens as collateral.
